snippet: In a letter to Thomas F. Prendergast, the president of New York City Transit,  John Samuelsen, president of Transport Workers Union Local 100, has proposed measures to reduce the number of deaths on New York City subway tracks.
lead_paragraph: In a letter to Thomas F. Prendergast, the president of New York City Transit,  John Samuelsen, president of Transport Workers Union Local 100, has proposed measures to reduce the number of deaths on New York City subway tracks.

headline.seo: Transit Workers Union to New York City Transit
headline.main: Transit Workers Union to New York City Transit
